thread.title: Liam Payne and Cheryl celebrate 'first anniversary' - what a year it's been
thread.title_full: Liam Payne and Cheryl celebrate 'first anniversary' - what a year it's been

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Liam Payne and Cheryl celebrate 'first anniversary' - what a year it's been
text:
(Photo: 2016 David M. Benett) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
It's hard to believe it's been exactly a year since Liam Payne confirmed his romance with Cheryl with a sweet Instagram snap. 
The black and white picture sent fans into a meltdown, with a topless Liam cuddling up to the former Girls Aloud singer. This picture got everyone talking (Photo: fakeliampayne/Instagram) It all happened a year ago (Photo: fakeliampayne/Instagram) 
He also changed his profile description to simply say "happy" - and it's still the same message 12 months later. 
It's been quite the year for the loved up couple, who are expecting their first child together. 
After months of keeping mum, the singer, 33, confirmed her pregnancy last week in a L’Oreal and Prince’s Trust charity campaign. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
